Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Financial/Business | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 07:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: March 28, 2012

Cash Britain is a documentary series which looks at how the different customers of a family-run pawnbrokers are coping in the current economic climate.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-31157)
